name: Golden Mushrooms!
description:
You need to get as much Golden Mushrooms as you can! Avoid red mushrooms with bugs inside with this Memory-inspired game!

There are 25 Mushrooms, you have:

- Golden Mushrooms: Get all of them and win the game (Yellow);

- Bug Mushrooms: If you find one of them, you lose a life (Red);

- Radar Mushrooms: Makes you see all of the hidden mushrooms one more time. (Brown);

- Imposter Mushrooms: This mushroom generate one random mushroom. It can help you or make you lose a life (White).

If you lose all the hearts (Lives), you lose the game!

A big thanks to Giacomo Borsellino for the graphics of the game!
